name: SiecoSmart
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
SiecoSmart leads the way in home security innovation, providing safer, simpler, and smarter solutions. Now, our latest devices are compatible with Alexa, offering you unmatched convenience and control at home.

With the SiecoSmart skill for Alexa, you can relax and watch live streams from your SiecoSmart cameras directly on Alexa devices like the Echo Show. Everything is at your fingertips, and your home is safer than ever.

How to get started:

1. Download the SiecoSmart app from the App Store or Google Play, set up your camera, and ensure it is online and operational.
2. Open the Alexa app, search for the SiecoSmart skill, and enable it to link your camera to your Alexa account. Then, locate your camera in the app.
3. Use voice commands such as “Alexa, show the living room” to view live feeds and maintain complete control over your home.

For any inquiries, please feel free to contact us at support@siecoelectronics.com
